seniority_level.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'SR Data Engineer' and description mentions 'Perfil senior'

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on ETL, data architecture, and pipeline development

sub_specialty.evidence: Core responsibilities include developing ETLs, Azure Data Factory, and Synapse Analytics - all batch-oriented tools

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing people or teams; focus is on technical design, development, and client presentations

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentions Microsoft Fabric, Synapse Analytics, Azure Data Factory - all Azure services

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms mentioned in requirements or description

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL development, Azure Data Factory, and Synapse Analytics - all primarily batch processing tools

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory is a cloud-native orchestration tool mentioned as a must-have skill

storage_layer.evidence: Responsibilities include designing Lakehouse or Warehouse architectures, with Microsoft Fabric (a lakehouse platform) as a required skill

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Arkansas, US with hybrid work model - implies regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: US-based company with Arkansas location, no specific timezone mentioned but implies Americas focus

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid work model mentioned with no relocation requirement stated

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship in Pass 1 extraction

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support; 'full_time' employment suggests work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement mentioned; 'full_time' position implies authorized to work in US

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with benefits mentioned (prepaga, vacation, etc.) suggests W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Multiple premium benefits mentioned: family health insurance, extended parental leave, learning budget, flexible work, bonuses, and unique perks like birthday off and food delivery reimbursement

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (7 items) and nice-to-have skills (4 items), with some flexibility implied

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role on data engineering with specific responsibilities around ETL, architecture, and client presentations

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (SQL, Python, Azure tools) are reasonable for a senior data engineer role
